Text.val: 07.03.2012 AS SCR#16826 various changes to get this program stable. See SSCR for details
06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing
//09.01.2006 BT SCR #10033 replaced error mail 'From' adress.
//21-06-2005 JP SCR #8526 replace error mail 'To' address
//01-06-2005 JP SCR #8266 change output from Error Handler to
a) seesion user and b) for internal handling
//24-09-2004 JP requested JP: extend message send via mail if error occured
//27-07-2004 JP SCR #6282 extend ICA Error Handler. For more info see SCR.
Set logfile name and create directory if it does not yet exist ...
Submit ICA190 so that the session gets closed and invalidated ....
generate logfile with information about the error ..
merge error information for the user and send back to requester ...

ExpSyntax.val: 'Creditview encountered an error, CUSR has been blocked and session has been invalidated'

Text.val: Get text for message CA9996 and overwrite if this fails ...

ExpSyntax.val: 'An error occured for your session. For security reasons your account has been blocked. Please contact service desk'

Text.val: generate XML with detailled error information ....
